name: 蘇春𤂌
objective: 1.電學:電力線, 電位場, 庫侖力, 電阻率, 電流分佈, 超導電性, 尖端放電, 電偶極, 極化, 介電性, 介電材料, 壓電性, 壓電材料, 掃描式與穿隧式電子顯微鏡, 電場屏蔽。2.磁學: 電流磁效應, 磁力線, 帶電粒子之運動, 霍耳效應, 高斯計, 質譜儀, 磁偶極, 磁滯, 磁性材料, 磁路設計, 超導材料與元件, 核磁共振成像, 磁場屏蔽。3.電磁場與電磁波：電磁感應, 渦電流, 電磁波, 偏極化, 反射與折射, 波導管, 微波濾波器, 天線, 無線通訊, 電磁屏蔽。
schedule:
Week 1 Chap.1 Introduction: Waves and Phasors
Week 2 & 3 Chap.2 Transmission Lines
Week 4 & 5 Chap.3 Vector Analysis
Week 6 & 7 Chap.4 Electrostatics
Week 8 Chap.5 Magnetostatics
Week 9 (11/9)複習及(11/11)期中考試
Week 10 & 11 Chap.6 Maxwell’s Equations for Time-Varying Fields
Week 12 & 13 Chap.7 Plane-Wave Propagation
Week 14 & 15 Chap.8 Reflection, Transmission, and Waveguides
Week 16 Chap.9 Radiation and Antennas
Week 17 Chap.10 Satellite Communication Systems and Radar Sensors
Week 18 (1/11)複習及(1/13)期末考試
materials:
Textbook:Fundamentals of Applied Electromagnetics, F. T. Ulaby, Pearson, 2007.
References:
1. N. N. Rao, “Fundamentals of Electromagnetics for Electrical and Computer Engineering,” Pearson, 2009.
2. J. D. Jackson, “Classical Electrodynamics,” John Wiley, 1975.
3. R. P. Feynman, “Lectures on Physics,” Addison-Wesley, 1964.
